name: D. Dima and Hares
statement:
Dima liked the present he got from Inna very much. He liked the present
he got from Seryozha even more. Dima felt so grateful to Inna about the
present that he decided to buy her hares. Inna was very happy. She lined
up the hares in a row, numbered them from 1 to from left to right and
started feeding them with carrots. Inna was determined to feed each hare
exactly once. But in what order should she feed them?Inna noticed that
each hare radiates joy when she feeds it. And the joy of the specific
hare depends on whether Inna fed its adjacent hares before feeding it.
Inna knows how much joy a hare radiates if it eats when either both of
his adjacent hares are hungry, or one of the adjacent hares is full
(that is, has been fed), or both of the adjacent hares are full. Please
note that hares number 1 and don’t have a left and a right-adjacent hare
correspondingly, so they can never have two full adjacent hares.Help
Inna maximize the total joy the hares radiate. :)
